pages.text: Stores RF and charges items in your inventory. It has 3 modes, allowing you to charge just your hotbar and armor, just your inventory, or everything, togglable using the change mode keybind. In order to toggle item charging on and off, shift right click while holding the capacitor. It can also be used to put energy in machines. It can be charged and augmented in the Tinker's Workbench.

pages.title: Flux Capacitor
pages.text: Press '$(k:cofh.mode_change_increment)' to change modes. It can be enchanted with $(l:thermal:world/holding)Holding$(/l) to improve RF capacity.
